version_description: Official support for Chat on Synology NAS.

1. Fixed an issue where some strings are not properly translated.
2. Usability enhancements.

1. Supports external users to sign in Chat with guest accounts to join the discussions.
2. Added a newly designed tool bar for uploading photos, videos, and files.
3. Added a new section in the channel list, allowing unread messages to be easily che

1. Supports browsing multiple pictures by swiping the screen in non-encrypted channels and conversations
2. Supports archiving the existing messages before inviting new members to join a private channel
3. Supports archiving messages when a channel

1. Supports iPhone X and iOS 11.
2. Supports collapsing and expanding channels and conversation lists.

The following feature requires Chat 2.0.0 Official:
1. Supports one-to-one conversations with bots to help enterprises

1. Fixed an issue where saving photos to iOS 11 devices might cause application crash
2. Minor bug fixes

Compatibility and installation
1. Chat 2.2.0 supports iOS 9 and the above versions

New features
1. Supports viewing users who react to the messages
2. Supports viewing users who create hashtags
3. Supports accessing conversations with d

Compatibility and Installation
1. This is the last version that supports Synology Chat Server versions 1.1 (2017-06-22) or older. As of the next release, mobile clients will only support Synology Chat Server 2.0 (2017-12-14) and later versions.

Updated Synology's terms and conditions for EU data privacy compliance.

1. Supports the use of slash commands to initiate video conferences from third-party applications including appear.in, Jitsi, and JumpChat
2. Supports tapping on phone numbers in messages to initiate calls
3. Added a new @mentions button on the tool

1. Enhanced application stability
2. Minor bug fixes

1. Optimized the display of unread threads to make them easier to find
2. Supports highlighting channels and threads with failed to send messages
3. Supports prioritizing channels with mentions to the top of the unread section

1. This is the last version that supports Synology Chat Server versions 1.1 (2017-06-22) or older. As of the next release, mobile clients will only support Synology Chat Server 2.0 (2017-12-14) and later versions.

Compatibility and Installation
1. This is the last version that supports iOS 11. As for the next release, Synology Chat will only support devices with iOS 12 or later versions.

What's New
1. Enhanced the security of connections.

Fixed issues
1. Fixed the issue where connecting via QuickConnect might fail.
2. Fixed the issue where signing in with application alias might fail.
